Package co.broadside.userstoragespi

Class KcUserStorageProvider

java.lang.Object
co.broadside.userstoragespi.KcUserStorageProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.keycloak.credential.CredentialInputUpdater, org.keycloak.credential.CredentialInputValidator, org.keycloak.provider.Provider, org.keycloak.storage.user.UserLookupProvider, org.keycloak.storage.user.UserQueryProvider, org.keycloak.storage.user.UserRegistrationProvider, org.keycloak.storage.UserStorageProvider
public class KcUserStorageProvider extends Object implements org.keycloak.storage.UserStorageProvider, org.keycloak.storage.user.UserLookupProvider, org.keycloak.storage.user.UserQueryProvider, org.keycloak.credential.CredentialInputUpdater, org.keycloak.credential.CredentialInputValidator, org.keycloak.storage.user.UserRegistrationProvider
This SPI extends Keycloak UserStorage to use our custom Users from KcUser database table.
Author:
bhavyag
